title: How to preserve old coins - Quora

response.answer_text: Well it depends on what sort of coins you are trying to preserve! Generally coins shall be packed in folders and kept in Coin sleeves and placed in albums for display  But this is not advisable for coins of high value in UNC condition with lustre as it will spoil the coins. In this case Plastic capsules shall be used to protect coins to preserve its shine!   (Note: Hand gloves shall be used as a additional precaution while placing/sorting) Always hold the coin in the rim area like this to keep the coins in intact  Happy collecting!!!
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Vikrant Singh Pawar

response.answer_text: There are plastic cases for all denomination’s. In addition they make ‘flips’, ‘slabs’, and storage boxes. Wear gloves when handling and DO NOT CLEAN THEM, IN ANY WAY….…….
Use Coin album which you can buy on leading e-commerce websites.
